name: Solarid
description:
Solarid is a top-down-shooter with fantasy and sci-fi elements.  Shoot enemies with your rapid-fire pistol and use spells to gain the upper hand in combat.

As the last guardian of a temple that shields the planet from the scorching sun, you awaken from deep slumber to find the temple overrun by creatures that have disabled it. Retrieve the power crystals that have been scattered around the temple to save the planet.
